# makeIterator()

**Instance Method**

Returns an iterator over the elements of this buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeIterator() -> UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<Element>.Iterator
```

## Return Value

An iterator over the elements of this buffer.
